structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS
C RESTRUCTURE OF LOCAL GOVERNMENT IN COUNTY CONTAINING CITY OF FIRST CLASS

law.catch_line: Mayor's certification of information on police officers.
law.text: Within thirty (30) days after the creation of a merit board under KRS 67C.301 to 67C.327, the mayor shall certify to the board the names, rank, rate of pay, and the seniority of every officer on the police force as of the effective date of the ordinance creating the board.
law.history: Created 2002 Ky. Acts ch. 339, sec. 6, effective July 15, 2002.
